dialogue.introduction: Yes... I am Taihou. Thank you for your reception. Admiral... I shall bring victory to you and your task force!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the Armoured Carrier, Taihou. I'm the newest and most advanced standard carrier that is armed with a flight deck. Aren't these enclosed hangars great? Hmm? You say that gas builds up easily? How rude. I-it'll be fine this time!
dialogue.secretary1: Admiral. Are you interested in my armoured flight deck?
dialogue.secretary2: Yes, these are the newest enclosed hangars. I can fit Ryuuseis and Reppus with no problem.
dialogue.secretary3: Are you really that interested in the colour of my flight deck? Your face is close... it's making me feel awkward.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral! Making me wait... I won't say anymore. Training and planning are important. Shall we sortie once we are properly ready?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, aren't you tired? Really? Well, that's okay. But don’t overdo it… okay?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral.. Did I meet your expectations? Well, that's great♪ But I've still got much more to go. Let's stay together and do our best!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Today's winds are good... Standard Carrier Taihou, heading out!
dialogue.supply: With proper supplies and training, they won't call us turkeys!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: You're right. A small wound may end up a fatal one.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: It's important to use this time to carry out some proper repairs.
dialogue.ship_construction: Construction of a new ship has been completed!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Campaign complete! The fleet has returned to base.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Everyone ready? We're going out. First mobile squadron, sortieing!
dialogue.battle_start: I'll show you the true strength of the newest and most advanced armoured carrier!
dialogue.air_battle: Reppu and Ryuusei. I wanted to see this squadron!
dialogue.attack: My brilliant pilots will show you what they're made of!
dialogue.night_battle: Yes. We shall use this opportunity to annihilate them!
dialogue.mvp: Admiral, did I not promise you victory? I won't lose!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: This level of damage would not faze me!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Hah! E-explosion?! My Tankers? Are they all right?!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Argh! M-my fuel! Gotta make sure it doesn't ignite!
dialogue.sunk: I'm sinking... again. However, you saw me going wild, didn't you? Good... I'm... satisfied.

hourly.0000: Midnight. I, Taihou shall be the one telling you the time today.
hourly.0100: 0100. Hmm? You want to train together? Sure.
hourly.0200: 0200. Even if I'm the newest and most advanced, I'll feel insecure if you keep looking at me like that!
hourly.0300: 0300. Admiral, shouldn't you take some sleep? Eh, you'll be fine?
hourly.0400: 040...0... Haa... Fuu... Ah, I- I'm not sleeping! Really!
hourly.0500: 0500. It's morning. Shall we start with some running? Eh, Dailies?
hourly.0600: 0600. Admiral, what would you like for breakfast? A Japanese meal from Mamiya?
hourly.0700: 0700. Stamina training is the most basic of basics. Some press ups before breakfast would go well.
hourly.0800: 0800. The breakfast was delicious! Now for some more muscle training!
hourly.0900: 0900. Admiral, why are you looking so tired before we have even started combat? Are you okay?
hourly.1000: 1000. Now, it's time to really start the fighting!
hourly.1100: 1100. That feels nice! Admiral, are you still holding up?
hourly.1200: 1200. It's noon. I wonder what sort of curry is served in this fleet.
hourly.1300: It's 1300. Eh?! It's my turn to make curry, as I'm the secretary this time?!
hourly.1400: 1400. Sorry, this ended up really late... but here's some Taihou curry.
hourly.1500: 1500. How was my curry? It was great...? Hurray!
hourly.1600: 1600. Most accidents occur in the evening. Let's stay vigilant!
hourly.1700: It's 1700. Eh?! An explosion from far away...? That's scary... be careful of fires!
hourly.1800: 1800. Um... my apologies... triggered explosions are the only thing I can't handle... enemies are fine.
hourly.1900: 1900. Admiral, as you're here... I've calmed down. It's true.
hourly.2000: 2000. That suisei? Yes, I would never forget it.
hourly.2100: 2100. This late already? Time seems to fly by when I'm with you. It's amazing.
hourly.2200: 2200. Admiral, you're done for the day, aren't you? How about some alcohol with the late night snack?
hourly.2300: 2300. If you drink too much... Oh? Hehe... your sleeping face is adorable. D'ohoh.
